original_title: Two killed at Enderamulla railway crossing
original_body_lines: Colombo, June 8 (Daily Mirror) - A 54-year-old man and a 34-year-old woman died following a car accident at a railway crossing at Enderamulla this morning, police said.

The accident reportedly occurred when a car travelling from Ederamulla towards Wattala collided with the train travelling from Badulla towards Colombo while the signal lights were on at the railway crossing.
